note.p: References: A P Segalen 'Un savant leonard au 18e siecle: Guillaume Mazeas' (Landerneau, 1720 - Vannes, 1775) 'Bull. Soc. Archeologique du Finistere', 115, 1986, 349-364.

Notes: Pogg wrongly dates 1712-1776. In addition to the above-named proposers, the following partially legible names appear beneath the citation in a column on the right: LemalDucde...(?), Gervaize Regia Navarra Summus moderator, de Sartigue (?) regiae societatis Navarricae doctor Theologus. On the left of the certificate is written: 'E regia Scientiarum Academia parisiensi et Societate regia Londinensi'. And on the right is: 'e regia Societate Navarrica'.
